TopicTitle: LLL - Lack Luster Labs - Development Thread

Articles.Content: Nice pics Lack. Well done. Looking forward to it.

I can take care of the part.cfg updates.

Here's what I plan to do, it shouldn't take more than a couple of hours. comments welcome.

[table=width: 500, class: grid, align: left]

[tr]

[td]Part Name[/td]

[td]Proposed Change[/td]

[/tr]

[tr]

[td]2x1 probe[/td]

[td]add 5/5/5 torque[/td]

[/tr]

[td]add 5/5/5 torque[/td]

[/tr]

[/tr]

[tr]

[/tr]

[/tr]

[tr]

[/tr]

[tr]

[/tr]

[/tr]

[/tr]

[/tr]

[tr]

[td]add SAS[/td]

[td]add SAS[/td]

[/tr]

[tr]

[td]Berty 5000[/td]

[td]make 0.21 compatible[/td]

[/tr]

[/table]

I was going to do this, but I couldn't think of good numbers for SAS torque. Thanks for taking this on.

OK, here's the edited parts only.

https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B5BknP-7pIn7R3VJWUswN3hrOVk/edit?usp=sharing

(plus you also get my edited 2x1 Ion drive, 2x1 nuclear reactor and 2x1 xenon/battery module. They're just edited parts with a different stripe colour, nothing fancy)

edit: if you use this, it's at your own risk etc. However, please let me know if you found it helpful/useful etc. I'm no modeler or texture artist but I can edit text!

Edited July 26, 2013 by dizzysaurus
adding disclaimer

I dont have the masses of the capsules memorized, but is 15 a little high (stock is 3)? I have no clue so don't take that question too seriously.
Gimme! Its like candy for my space fairing souuul!!!

I dont have the masses of the capsules memorized, but is 15 a little high (stock is 3)? I have no clue so don't take that question too seriously.

I just put something that seemed OK - I'll leave it up to Lack to decide on the final torque values. For the dedicated inertial wheel 2x1 I figured a high value was OK for something so big. For the crew capsule I used 5 torque per passenger. They're higher than some of the stock units, so tweaking them is definitely in order.
That is a nice effort there dizzy, cheers. Do I have to download each file individually, or am I just not seeing it properly?

That is a nice effort there dizzy, cheers. Do I have to download each file individually, or am I just not seeing it properly?

it's a zip file, but I think google is trying to be "helpful" and show you what's inside it. Go to the file menu and download from there. You should end up with a LLL.zip which has the LLL directory that is placed in your GameData directory and merged with your current LLL parts.

Hope that helps.

it's a zip file, but I think google is trying to be "helpful" and show you what's inside it. Go to the file menu and download from there. You should end up with a LLL.zip which has the LLL directory that is placed in your GameData directory and merged with your current LLL parts.

Hope that helps.

Ah thanks. That was it, didn't even think of that

Ah thanks. That was it, didn't even think of that

no problem, I shared it and it stumped me for a bit. Let me know if there's any trouble, east coast USA heading to bed now so it will be a while before I answer.

Not sure if its just me but my load screen will hang up on this part: LLL/parts/structural/lll2x1hull/model

It was fine yesterday when I upgraded. But today... not so much.
Yep it was just me. Did a complete uninstall and re-installed everything and we're good. Thanks for the parts!!! KSP is not as fun without them.

Here's mine. Was more of a 'How many parts can you lob into space without killing your game' challenge with a few friends of mine.

Here's mine. Was more of a 'How many parts can you lob into space without killing your game' challenge with a few friends of mine.

Nice! I like the rear end. (wow, phrasing)
You've got some awesome looking stuff, thanks for the update on everything Lack!

wow not look at the thread for a weekend an suddenly 3 pages of posts

also welcome back lack ^^
In the imigur pictures, what mods do you use?
Is LLL compatable with 0.21?

Is LLL compatable with 0.21?

Yes/No, all the parts work, however the SAS modules and capsules need to have reaction wheels added to them, see page 56 for details on a temporary fix until an official Lack update.
does anybody remember that movie from 2009 it was called moon i think thats where they got the design for most of this pack

http://i.imgur.com/XrW552g.png

What mod do those landing legs com from?

http://i.imgur.com/XrW552g.png

What mod do those landing legs com from?

I think those are the heavy landing legs from B9 Aerospace.
They are indeed from B9 Aerospace, however it's important to note that Lack resized them. They're huge straight out of B9.....
so, I guess from the previous posts that 0.21.1 compatibility is in the works? awesome, I will wait until then because this is good work, well worth waiting for!
